column1: Little Goat Diner////Undeterred by my muffin experience
column2: I tried out the diner a couple days later on NYE morning
column4: which is a welcome change from Girl & the Goat.  I ordered the Fat Elvis waffles (without bacon syrup since I don't eat the swine)
column5: and it was awesome!  A very simple dish
column6: but the waffle's perfect combination of chewiness and sweetness elevated the dish. The portion was huge too so I had half the next day for breakfast
column7: and it was still really good.  Hubby had the biscuits and gravy
column8: which he declared were the best he had ever had.  He's had a lot of B&Gs so that's saying something.  We also ordered the hash browns with goat cheese
column9: and they were a bit too soggy and greasy for me.
